A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have watched the movie 2 times now.  The first time in the theater and the second online.  I do not feel like lining Disney pockets on this one like I did for TFA.  This movie is not HORRIBLE\, however has more opportunities then it has wins.  If Rian Johnson filmed this as a fan then I would hate to see what he would have done as a non-fan. Rose is completely annoying and pointless.  Finn should have had his swan song at the end to really bring people into the movie.  Kylo Ren needs to have a mask in 9 because the villain needs to be Threatening/Scary/Ominous.   Can we get an epic lightsaber battle?  I honestly think they trapped themselves with Kylo's saber because he can obviously not use it very well due to its unusual size and shape.
